titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I worked at the Swedish lecture, revised the sermon, walked with Ernest, read the papers in the club, and wrote the letters.

issues a "New Year's message" to the nation emphasizing the Fatherhood of God as the supreme truth on which alone can be built securely the Brotherhood of Man. It is an edifying production, and should be printed in an appendix to the popular edition of Keyne's book on the Peace!
